reviews.text:
Such a hidden gem in the middle of Orchard!
Da Paolo Gastronomia is everything I love in a dining spot—cozy, low-key, and full of honest, hearty Italian food.

I came for the lasagna (which I heard people queue to takeaway!), but ended up loving the truffle fries, handmade pizza, and in-house gelato just as much.
Everything is made fresh and served in a space that feels calm and relaxed—no trendy decor, just real Italian vibes.

Amazing food and excellent service by Geraldine. Despite having a busy crowd due to mother's day, Geraldine was always really patient and nice when attending to the various customers including us. Super amazing service by Geraldine well done!

Didnt know this place is so popular until I had lunch here, the crowd is always full, people ordered wide variety of food. I tried their truffle fries, lasagna and gelato. All taste super good, esp the pistachio gelato, it’s a must try!

Nice ham and cheese croissant, coupled with Americano and Cappuccino. E-order but need to pay service charge. Good for quick bites and rest, but suitable for chat or discussion as the crowds are noisy (during my visit).

Great atmosphere and fantastic range of food - the deli has a good range of cakes too!! Prices are unfortunately very much overpriced. Nice overall atmosphere and seems like they recently underwent a revamp to install more seats. Great atmosphere overall. Service is via a QR code on the table.
